The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 20 July is 52,792 (6,110.3 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 15 July, there were 3,605 new confirmed cases (417.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 08 July, there were 2,269 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 59% (1,336 extra cases).
